{{Wired embedded system |brand=Barracuda |model=CloudGen Firewall |revision=X300 (BNHW026/BFWX300a) |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf=Micro-Star |manuf_model=MS-S1401 |manuf_rev=V1.0 |type=Router Firewall |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.42 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Atom |cpu1_model=C2358 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EMI-12G |fla2=80 GiB |fla2_brand=Intel |fla2_model=SSDMCEAW080A4 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC |ram2=4 GiB |ram2_brand=Samsung |ram2_model=DDR3 (DIMM) |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, SATA 3.0, mSATA |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=4 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, RJ45 console,, (19200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1543 |eth_chip3_brand=Intel |eth_chip3_model=WGI210AT (x2) |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=6 |addl_chips=LPC Super I/O IC;Nuvoton;NCT5533D;;1;,,, 256K SPI Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT25256B;;1;,,, PCIe Clock Generator;Silicon Labs;SI52138;;1;,,, 3V 16M-bit SPI Serial Flash;Winbond;W25Q16DV;;2;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Texas Instruments;MAX3243C;;1;,,, PCI-Express Gen 4 Quad Fanout Buffer;Skyworks;Si53154;;1;,,, 2A Very Low Dropout Regulator w/ Enable;Semtech;SC4215A;;2;,,, 3A Ultra Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Niko-Sem;GS7103-A;;4;,,, Hex Inverter with Schmitt Trigger Input;Diodes Inc;74LVC14A;;1;,,, 2D Video Graphic Adapter w/ PCIe Interface;Aspeed Tech;AST1400;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;2;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4413;;1;,,, Single-Phase Synchronous Buck Regulator;On Semi;NCP81109E;;3;,,, High Current Synchronous Buck Converter;On Semi;NCP3232N;;4;,,, 3A 3MHz Synchronous Buck Regulator;On Semi;NCP1593B;;1;,,, Synchronous PWM Switching Converter;On Semi;NCP3170;;2;,,, 30V 22A N-Channel MOSFET;On Semi;FDMS7698;;1; |flags=VGA, RTC w/ battery, power switch, fan, buzzer, heatsink, metal case |stock_boot=Grub;0.97; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.38.7;Barracuda NG Firewall 6.2.1-057; |default_ip=192.168.200.200 |default_user=root |default_pass=ngf1r3wall |oui_eth=D8:CB:8A }} {{TagLine|Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300}} :[https://www.barraguard.com/Barracuda-Firewall-X300.asp Product page]
"MS-S1401VER:1.0", "MICRO-STAR" and "Model MS-S1401" :are silkscreened under the heatsink.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2358 @1.7GHz (Dual-Core) *Storage: 8MB (CMOS) Serial Flash, 80GB Intel mSATA SSD *Memory: 4GB (DDR3 DIMM) RAM *PCI: 1x PCIe, 1x mSATA slots *Network: 6x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 19V, 3.42A via barrel
==Images== <gallery> File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 PCI Net Board Top.jpeg|PCI Network Board Top File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 PCI Net Board Bottom.jpeg|PCI Network Board Bottom File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 LED Board Top.jpeg|LED Board Top File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 LED Board Bottom.jpeg|LED Board Bottom File:Barracuda CloudGen Firewall X300 Internal.jpeg|Internal View </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
